Title: Microsoft offers to keep ‘Call of Duty’ on PlayStation for at least a decade as it seeks to close Activision deal
Content: Microsoft proposed licenses that would allow wide availability of Activision Blizzard games for at least a decade in bid to preserve $69 billion acquisition.

Title: Nvidia Stock: FOMO Versus Fundamentals. What Should Investors Do?
Content: Sentiment can change on Wall Street as the wind blows; graphics processing unit (GPU) leader Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) declined roughly 59% over the first nine months of 2022. Let's take a breath before rushing to place that buy order; some concerns could keep Nvidia's stock from continuing its skyward trajectory. Here is what the fundamentals say about Nvidia's path forward.

Title: 3 Things About AMD That Smart Investors Know
Content: As a leader in computing components, Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) is a company building the future with lucrative prospects in a variety of industries that all require its hardware to move forward. With its stock showing signs of recovery, now is an excellent time to learn more about this company of the future. Here are three things about AMD that smart investors know.

Title: Beyond the Hype -- Examining Nvidia's Biggest Risks
Content: While Nvidia has a massive growth opportunity due to artificial intelligence and popular applications like ChatGPT, investors should also be aware of the potential risks associated with investing in the company.

Title: 3 Stocks That Could Be Worth More Than Tesla by 2030
Content: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) is practically the Rorschach test of stocks. Whatever your take on it is, one thing is certain: Its market cap is a lot lower than it was just a year ago. Here are three stocks that could be worth more than Tesla by 2030.

Title: Look Beyond AI: This $42 Billion Market Could Be a Game Changer for Nvidia
Content: The tech giant established a nice foothold in a fast-growing market that could add billions to its revenue.

Title: Nvidia's Stock Offering -- a Sign of Confidence or Desperation?
Content: Nvidia recently announced a mixed-shelf offering of up to $10 billion. The news shocked many investors as the company has plenty of cash and cash flow.

Title: Intel's Roadmap Changes -- a Sign of Desperation or a Bold Move?
Content: Intel announced that it would discontinue the development of certain GPU products. While it might seem like more bad news for this semiconductor giant, Intel gives an excellent reason for the changes.

Title: Why Super Micro Computer Gained 35.4% in February
Content: Coming off a short-seller attack in January, Super Micro's second-quarter earnings came in better than feared, and AI enthusiasm helped the stock recover.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Watch: Big Tech Expands AI Products, Services
Content: When looking for the best artificial intelligence stocks to buy, identify companies using AI technology to improve products or gain a strategic edge.
